projects.title: Bus Mall
projects.description: BusMall is a application of randomly selected images in a web document meant to track the clicks on each image. Retrieve the data from an array of image objects and display that data as a list in the DOM.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This project is a site that generates and calculates simulated sales data based what is entered into a constructor function that outputs new store location data. The site includes a form where the user can create new stores

projects.title: Blackjack
projects.description: This website gives players without any experience in blackjack a chance to practice in a safe environment. This will be a 1v1, User vs generated computed dealer. Whoever gets closer or reaches 21 will be made the winner of that round and all users will be stored in a scoreboard.
